text:
Nocache directive no longer supported in 2.0.36 and its replacement,
CacheDisable directive does not appear to work.

Have not been able to exclude certain URL'S from the proxy cache.
creator: jcalvi@lewis.com.au

text:
This module is experimental.  Please try .39 and see if that helps, and
  recognize much development continues on the caching support.

  Reopen this report if the problem isn't addressed by the release of 2.0.40.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
